text: Badtameez kab ban gya tu pta nhi chala bahot busy admi tha tu and har jgh gand marake sikhne vala bhi , love you bhai end me course pass krane ke liye , apan teeno(with modi) ke last moments yaad aayenge hamesha.ğŸ˜›
author: Manvendra  Singh

text: Bhut mehnati insaan lga shuru me bad me secrets pta chale. Tu to likhega nhi bhai ke liye keoki bhul gya hoga ğŸ˜‚. Ye emotional blackmail nhi h sachi me. Enjoy kro life ko and give your best â¤ï¸
author: Manvendra  Singh

text: Chal bhag bsdk tera memoir thodi likhunga aur bhi kam h
author: Manvendra  Singh

text: Bhai apna hero h. Mje dilaye tune sabse jyada ME com me. Loved your story.intiatives lete raho and life me angrej bane raho
author: Manvendra  Singh

text: Room pr jyada time pass kiya h tere , bhar jate samay to bhane teyar rakhta tha tu aur iss bar bhi ghar ka bhana dekar college nhi aya gille shikwe to rahenge but bhai h tu yad rakhio baki yamul and burla betiC nikle bhut dukh hota h. End me courses sath me krke mja aya. Love you bhai
author: Manvendra  Singh

text: Shuru se end tak sare labs sath me ki aur kam krke mja aya, bhai in future startup me kaam ho to jarur btana. Dusro ko gali dene me apni meri tarf se deep understanding thi ğŸ˜‰. Likhte acha ho and sunate raho bhai ko
author: Manvendra  Singh

text: You were unpredictable guy, pta nhi shyd hi koi course kiya ho sath me but hall me backchodi bhut kati h , last me unexpectedly mota bhi ho gya tu gym join krle ya fir football khelte rehna, love from dtop familyâ¤ï¸
author: Manvendra  Singh

text:
Rommie itni harkaton ke bad bhi jinda bach gya mere hatho se sukar h rab ka. First year me to kush tha bad me thoda dukhi dukhi rha. Pta nhi meri vjh se ya bandi ka chakkr tha. Koi ni bhai h tere sath mje lene ke liye ğŸ˜‰.
Ghar pr milte h ğŸ˜‚ aunty ko bhi bol dena karuna kaal ke bad aunga
author: Manvendra  Singh
